name: Bike Mania Pack 1
description:
* BIKE MANIA *

The first 20 levels of the original and most popular bike game, with MILLIONS of online plays, comes to iOS devices for FREE!

* FEATURES *

- Real-time biking engine.

- Two ways to bike - Tilt your device or use the specially designed Slider system.

- Bike across 20 challenging levels.

- Takes advantage of HD RETINA display.
